text: Naa ʋoluma, Ezekiase zɛbɛzeɠeni, é siɠigi ʋaaɓɛtɛ, ʋɛti kpein zeɠei ɠɛni náti ba, é siɠi gaaɠoozagi ta zeini siɠigi ɠa. É siɠigi taɠili toni ʋolu ga etea ʋelei, nii a kɛ é ɠɛ ɠoozu ga felegɔ. É pɛtugi laave ʋolu, ná laa ga Milo, Davide ná-taazuʋɛ. É kɔɔɠɔ zɔɔla mɔinmɔin kpɛtɛni, naa ʋɛɛ kɔɔɠɔ zɛpɛgiti ba.
